Exaggerate: The claim of Giant Tiger giving away a $250 coupon is exaggerated as it is a fraudulent promotion circulating on Facebook.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or confirmation from Giant Tiger about the coupon giveaway.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that sharing a link and answering questions will lead to receiving a coupon, which is a problematic assumption as it is a fraudulent scheme.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the promotion is a scam designed to collect personal information and deceive users.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Giant Tiger has stated that there is a fraudulent promotion circulating and has urged people to report it.
Understate: There is no understatement bias present in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter at times as it consistently highlights the fraudulent nature of the promotion.
